translations: n.双桅横帆船；禁闭室；警卫室

phrs.translation: 双桅横帆船, 布里格, 双桅帆船, 剩余的
双桅帆船, 一种双桅帆船
双桅横帆战船, 双桅战船
纵帆式双桅帆船, 斯库纳帆船

sentences.sentence: There was not a child on board the brig that night who did not already love him.
sentences.translation: 那天晚上，在船上的禁闭室里的每一个孩子都爱他。

sentences.sentence: Despite its cuddly name, the Beagle was a naval brig outfitted with 10 guns.
sentences.translation: 尽管它的名字很是逗人喜爱，但小猎犬号是一艘装备有10支枪的海军双桅横帆船。

sentences.sentence: Next time don't forget to brig me a copy of your work.
sentences.translation: 下次不要忘了把一份您的作品带给我。
